group_1.textLeft: That’s it, I’m done!

group_1.textRight: [chara:304401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah, wai–...!

group_1.textLeft: Yay, I won~

group_1.textRight: Well, you seem to have improved a lot since the last@time…

group_1.textLeft: I don’t wanna lose to Ranka again, so I’ve done quite@a bit of practice~

group_1.textRight: No wonder...@I haven’t played this in ages...

group_1.textLeft: Then, for our next rematch, how about we play a@different game?

group_1.textRight: Let's see then, in that case...
Wanna play this fighting game? It just updated@recently.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, is that a new character?

group_1.textRight: No, it seems to be…
“Campaign of the Implementation of Swimsuit@Character Edit Function” so it says.
Looks like you can now design swimsuits you like@and put them on your character.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...Swimsuit. I’m not really interested...
Well, let’s give it a try.
Ah, Ranka, look! This ribbon is so cute~
Having one on the chest gives someone a@completely different impression~

group_1.textRight: Cute, but, if you're going that route, why not make@it even weirder?
Like, use that national flag pattern or something.

group_1.textLeft: What, yuck!@Now, to choose a shape...

group_1.textRight: Oh, well, make it one of those krazy-ass high-leg@numbers...

group_1.textLeft: Nope, I like the less revealing ones a little more~
...Ooh, this bikini with outerwear seems really good!
It can cover the waist, not to mention how fluffy@and cute it is~

group_1.textRight: ...Hey, Ao.
Haven't you like, just chosen a swimsuit you@normally wear?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102301:cheek_0][chara:102301:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:102301:lipSynch_1]Huh?

group_1.textRight: Do you want to go to the sea?

group_1.textLeft: No no no!
As an indoor gal, why would I want to enjoy the@seaside...
I’m not that kind of person, okay?

group_1.textRight: Well, it’s indeed hard to imagine, but...

group_1.textLeft: ...Okay, this game's over! Delete the swimsuit we@made!
Let's play another game instead.

group_1.textRight: What, for real? I don’t care either way...

group_1.textLeft: For re–al, for re–al!

group_1.textRight: Ao, the enemy went over there!

group_1.textLeft: Yay—!@Our team made a big turnaround~

group_1.textRight: It's easy to play as a team with video calls.

group_1.textCenter: Ah, looks like a package has arrived...

group_1.textRight: Well, we've played a lot of games today.
Right on time to finish!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah~@Let's do this again next time...

group_1.textCenter: Oh, it’s this thing...@It arrived so quickly.
Since I’ve bought this, I’ll just give it a try...
The swimsuit I bought is similar to the one I made@with Character Edit...
...This seems better than I expected, hehe...

group_1.textRight: ...Um, Ao...?@Your clothes…

group_1.textLeft: W-why is the call still connected...?!

group_1.textRight: H-Hikaru doesn’t know either!
I heard Ao's voice, so when I looked at the screen,@I saw...
There was Ao in a swimsuit...
So, I mean, why are you in a swimsuit?

group_1.textLeft: W-what’s wrong with wearing a swimsuit indoors...?

group_1.textRight: Nothing, but...@It's a little surprising...
Ao is an indoor girl, so Hikaru didn’t expect you to@be interested in this kind of thing.

group_1.textLeft: Usually I’m not very interested, but~...
...Hey, if I said that I want to go to the sea...would@that be weird?

group_1.textRight: Well, not really. It’s summer after all.

group_1.textLeft: That's right...@It's summer, so it can't be helped~
Hey, if there’s ever a day when the weather is nice@and there's nothing to do...
I hope everyone can go to the sea.

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, let’s go to the sea.

group_1.textLeft: Mhmm,@[chara:102350:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102350:cheek_0][chara:102350:eyeClose_1][chara:102350:lipSynch_1]I'm looking forward to it–...
